name: By the Fates
description: The executable is in a zip. We made it in 2 days with a group of 2 programmers and 1 artist, so it's playable... kinda. The main thing we wanted to get out was the concept. It seemed like a fun twist to the game jams "Out of Control" theme for us to leave the path you travel in game up to a coin flip. That way that decision is entirely "Out of [the player's] control".
